traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.description: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage to the target.

special_abilities.name: Summoning Air Elementals
special_abilities.description: Five aarakocra within 30 feet of each other can magically summon an air elemental. Each must use its action and movement on three consecutive turns to perform an aerial dance and maintain concentration. The elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet, is friendly, and obeys commands for 1 hour or until dismissed/destroyed.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Mucous Cloud
traits.description: While underwater, a creature that touches the aboleth or hits it with a melee attack within 5 ft. must succeed on a DC 14 Con save or be diseased for 1d4 hours (can breathe only underwater).

traits.name: Probing Telepathy
traits.description: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, it learns the creature's greatest desires if it can see the creature.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Con save or become diseased (see description for full effects).

actions.name: Enslave (3/Day)
actions.description: One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a DC 14 Wis save or be magically charmed until the aboleth dies or is on another plane. The target is under the aboleth's control and can communicate telepathically.

options: Detect: Makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
Tail Swipe: Makes one tail attack.
Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions): One charmed creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage; aboleth regains HP equal to damage dealt.

monsters.name: Deva
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.description: Weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 4d8 radiant damage.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Charisma (DC 17). At will: detect evil and good. 1/day each: commune, raise dead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Two melee attacks.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.description: Target regains 20 (4d8 + 2) hit points and is cured of curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.description: Polymorph into a humanoid or beast of CR ≤ 10 or back to true form.

monsters.name: Planetar
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.description: Weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 5d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Charisma (spell save DC 20). At will: detect evil and good, invisibility (self only). 3/day each: blade barrier, dispel evil and good, flame strike, raise dead. 1/day each: commune, control weather, insect plague.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The planetar makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
actions.description: The target magically regains 30 (6d8 + 3) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

monsters.name: Solar
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.description: Weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 6d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Divine Awareness
traits.description: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Charisma (spell save DC 25). At will: detect evil and good, invisibility (self only). 3/day each: blade barrier, dispel evil and good, resurrection. 1/day each: commune, control weather.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The solar makes two greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Slaying Longbow
actions.hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 27 (6d8) radiant damage. If the target has 190 hit points or fewer, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or die.

actions.name: Flying Sword
actions.description: The solar releases its greatsword to hover magically within 5 feet. As a bonus action, it can command the sword to fly up to 50 feet and make one attack or return to its hands. If targeted, the solar is considered holding it. The sword falls if the solar dies.

actions.name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
actions.description: The target magically regains 40 (8d8 + 4) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

options: Teleport: The solar teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Searing Burst (Costs 2 Actions): Each creature of its choice in a 10-foot radius must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half on a success.
Blinding Gaze (Costs 3 Actions): One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until removed by magic like lesser restoration.

monsters.name: Animated Armor
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.description: Incapacitated in an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While motionless, indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The armor makes two melee attacks.

monsters.name: Flying Sword
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 7

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.description: Incapacitated in an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While motionless and not flying, indistinguishable from a normal sword.

monsters.name: Rug of Smothering
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.description: The rug is incapacitated while in an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: Damage Transfer
traits.description: While grappling a creature, the rug takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the grappled creature takes the other half.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While motionless, the rug is indistinguishable from a normal rug.

actions.name: Smother
actions.hit: The creature is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, blinded, and at risk of suffocating, and the rug can't smother another target. At the start of each of the target's turns, it takes 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Ankheg
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 11

actions.name: Bite
actions.hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can bite only the grappled creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

actions.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
actions.description: The ankheg spits acid in a 30-foot long, 5-foot wide line, provided it has no creature grappled. Each creature in the line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

traits.name: Heated Body
traits.description: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

traits.name: Heated Weapons
traits.description: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

monsters.name: Banshee
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Detect Life
traits.description: The banshee can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away, knowing their general direction but not exact locations.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, taking 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

actions.name: Horrifying Visage
actions.description: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet that can see the banshee must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the save at the end of each turn, with disadvantage if the banshee is in line of sight, ending the effect on a success. Immune for 24 hours if successful or effect ends.

actions.name: Wail (1/Day)
actions.description: If not in sunlight, the banshee releases a wail. Non-constructs and non-undead within 30 feet that can hear must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points; on success, it takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

traits.name: Petrifying Gaze
traits.description: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet and both can see each other, the basilisk can force a DC 12 Constitution saving throw if not incapacitated. On failure, the creature is restrained and must repeat the save at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on failure or ending the effect on success. A non-surprised creature can avert its eyes to avoid the save, but cannot see the basilisk until its next turn. If the basilisk sees its reflection in bright light within 30 feet, it targets itself.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The behir makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 16) if the behir isn't already constricting, and is restrained until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The behir exhales lightning in a 20-foot long, 5-foot wide line. Each creature in the line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: The behir makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller grappled target. If it hits, the target is swallowed, ending the grapple. The swallowed target is blinded, restrained, has total cover, and takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each behir turn. If the behir takes 30+ damage in one turn from the swallowed creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or regurgitate the creature.

traits.name: Antimagic Cone
traits.description: The beholder's central eye creates a 150-foot cone of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell. At the start of each turn, it decides the cone's direction and whether it's active. The cone affects its own eye rays.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The beholder shoots three random eye rays (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets within 120 feet.

rays.name: Charm Ray
rays.effect: Charmed for 1 hour or until harmed by the beholder.

rays.name: Paralyzing Ray
rays.effect: Paralyzed for 1 minute, repeatable save each turn.

rays.name: Fear Ray
rays.effect: Frightened for 1 minute, repeatable save each turn.

rays.name: Slowing Ray
rays.effect: Speed halved, no reactions, action or bonus action only for 1 minute, repeatable save.

rays.name: Enervation Ray
rays.effect: 36 (8d8) necrotic damage, half on success.

rays.name: Telekinetic Ray
rays.effect: Move target up to 30 feet, restrained if creature until next turn.

rays.name: Sleep Ray
rays.effect: Unconscious for 1 minute, wakes on damage or action, no effect on constructs/undead.

rays.name: Petrification Ray
rays.effect: Restrained, repeat save next turn; petrified on failure, ends on success.

rays.name: Disintegration Ray
rays.effect: 45 (10d8) force damage, disintegrates if reduced to 0 HP or if Large/smaller nonmagical object.

rays.name: Death Ray
rays.effect: 55 (10d10) necrotic damage, dies if reduced to 0 HP.

options: Eye Ray: The beholder uses one random eye ray.

monsters.name: Death Tyrant
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone

traits.name: Negative Energy Cone
traits.description: The death tyrant's central eye emits a 150-foot cone of negative energy. At the start of each turn, it decides the cone's direction and whether it's active. Creatures in the area can't regain hit points, and humanoids that die become zombies under the tyrant's command.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The death tyrant shoots three random eye rays (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets within 120 feet.

rays.name: Charm Ray
rays.effect: Charmed for 1 hour or until harmed by the tyrant.

rays.name: Paralyzing Ray
rays.effect: Paralyzed for 1 minute, repeatable save each turn.

rays.name: Fear Ray
rays.effect: Frightened for 1 minute, repeatable save each turn.

rays.name: Slowing Ray
rays.effect: Speed halved, no reactions, action or bonus action only for 1 minute, repeatable save.

rays.name: Enervation Ray
rays.effect: 36 (8d8) necrotic damage, half on success.

rays.name: Telekinetic Ray
rays.effect: Move target up to 30 feet, restrained if creature until next turn.

rays.name: Sleep Ray
rays.effect: Unconscious for 1 minute, wakes on damage or action, no effect on constructs/undead.

rays.name: Petrification Ray
rays.effect: Restrained, repeat save next turn; petrified on failure, ends on success.

rays.name: Disintegration Ray
rays.effect: 45 (10d8) force damage, disintegrates if reduced to 0 HP or if Large/smaller nonmagical object.

rays.name: Death Ray
rays.effect: 55 (10d10) necrotic damage, dies if reduced to 0 HP.

options: Eye Ray: The death tyrant uses one random eye ray.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The spectator shoots up to two random eye rays at one or two creatures within 90 feet, using each ray once per turn.

rays.name: Confusion Ray
rays.effect: No reactions until end of next turn, can't move, makes random attack if possible.

rays.name: Paralyzing Ray
rays.effect: Paralyzed for 1 minute, repeatable save each turn.

rays.name: Fear Ray
rays.effect: Frightened for 1 minute, repeatable save with disadvantage if spectator visible.

rays.name: Wounding Ray
rays.effect: 16 (3d10) necrotic damage, half on success.

actions.name: Create Food and Water
actions.description: The spectator magically creates enough food and water to sustain itself for 24 hours.

reactions.name: Spell Reflection
reactions.description: If the spectator succeeds on a saving throw against a spell or a spell attack misses, it can choose another creature within 30 feet. The spell targets that creature instead, with a new save or attack roll.

monsters.name: Needle Blight
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 9

monsters.name: Twig Blight
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 9

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While motionless, the blight is indistinguishable from a dead shrub.

monsters.name: Vine Blight
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While motionless, the blight is indistinguishable from a tangle of vines.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and a Large or smaller target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the blight can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Entangling Plants (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Grasping roots and vines sprout in a 15-foot radius centered on the blight, lasting 1 minute. The area is difficult terrain for non-plant creatures. Creatures of the blight's choice in the area when plants appear must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be restrained. A creature can use its action to make a DC 12 Strength check to free itself or another.

traits.name: Brute
traits.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.description: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage in melee or 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage at range.

traits.name: Brute
traits.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Heart of Hruggek
traits.description: The bugbear has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, or put to sleep.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.description: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bugbear makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage in melee or 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage at range.

monsters.name: Bulette
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.description: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Deadly Leap
actions.description: If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then land on its feet in a space containing one or more other creatures. Each creature must succeed on a DC 16 Str or Dex save (target's choice) or be knocked prone and take 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning + 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage. On success, half damage, not prone, pushed 5 ft. If no unoccupied space, falls prone in bulette's space.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
traits.description: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

traits.name: Swamp Camouflage
traits.description: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.description: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bullywug makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear.

actions.name: Spear
actions.hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monsters.name: Cambion
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Fiendish Blessing
traits.description: The AC of the cambion includes its Charisma bonus.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Charisma (spell save DC 14). At will: alter self, command, detect magic. 1/day: plane shift (self only).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cambion makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

actions.name: Spear
actions.hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fiendish Charm
actions.description: One humanoid within 30 ft. must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom save or be charmed for 1 day. Obeys spoken commands. If harmed by cambion or given suicidal command, repeats save. Immune for 24 hours if successful or effect ends.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The carrion crawler has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The carrion crawler can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The carrion crawler makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. Repeat save each turn.

traits.name: Charge
traits.description: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its pike and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite or horns.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The dragon head exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

monsters.name: Chuul
monsters.languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The chuul can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Sense Magic
traits.description: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but is not itself magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The chuul makes two pincer attacks. If the chuul is grappling a creature, it can also use its tentacles once.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 14) if Large or smaller and the chuul doesn't have two other creatures grappled.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: One creature grappled by the chuul must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. Repeat save each turn.

traits.name: Damage Transfer
traits.description: While attached to a creature, the cloaker takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down), and that creature takes the other half.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While motionless without its underside exposed, indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.description: While in bright light, the cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cloaker makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and if Large or smaller, the cloaker attaches to it (head, blinded, can't breathe). Advantage on attack rolls while attached. Can detach by spending 5 ft. movement. DC 16 Str check to detach.

actions.name: Moan
actions.description: Each creature within 60 ft. that can hear and isn't an aberration must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom save or be frightened until end of cloaker's next turn. Success grants immunity for 24 hours.

actions.name: Phantasms (Recharges after Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: Creates three illusory duplicates if not in bright light. Duplicates mimic actions. Attacks/spells target randomly unless creature can't see or relies on non-sight senses. Duplicates have cloaker's AC and saves; disappear when hit or fail damaging save.

actions.name: Bite
actions.hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw against magical petrification. On failure, restrained and begins turning to stone; repeat save next turn. Success ends effect; failure petrifies for 24 hours.

monsters.name: Couatl
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant
monsters.damage_immunities: psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Charisma (DC 14). At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, detect thoughts. 3/day each: bless, create food and water, cure wounds, lesser restoration, protection from poison, sanctuary, shield. 1/day each: dream, greater restoration, scrying.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The couatl's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Shielded Mind
traits.description: The couatl is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

actions.name: Bite
actions.hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 24 hours. Until this poison ends, the target is unconscious. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the couatl can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.description: Polymorph into a humanoid or beast of CR ≤ own, or back to true form. Retains statistics and speech, but AC, movement, Str, Dex, etc. replaced by new form. Gains new form's capabilities (except class features, legendary/lair actions).

monsters.name: Couatl
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant
monsters.damage_immunities: psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Charisma (spell save DC 14). At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, detect thoughts. 3/day each: bless, create food and water, cure wounds, lesser restoration, protection from poison, sanctuary, shield. 1/day each: dream, greater restoration, scrying.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The couatl's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Shielded Mind
traits.description: The couatl is immune to scrying and any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

actions.name: Bite
actions.hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 24 hours. Until this poison ends, the target is unconscious. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the couatl can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.description: Polymorph into a humanoid or beast of CR ≤ own, or back to true form. Retains statistics and speech, but AC, movement, Str, Dex replaced by new form. Gains new form's capabilities (except class features, legendary/lair actions).

monsters.name: Crawling Claw
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.description: The claw is immune to effects that turn undead.

traits.name: Poor Depth Perception
traits.description: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks.

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.description: The darkmantle can't use its blindsight while deafened.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While motionless, the darkmantle is indistinguishable from a cave formation such as a stalactite or stalagmite.

actions.name: Crush
actions.hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the darkmantle attaches to the target. If Medium or smaller and the darkmantle has advantage, it engulfs the target's head, blinding and suffocating. While attached, attacks only the target with advantage, speed 0, moves with target. DC 13 Strength check to detach.

actions.name: Darkness Aura (1/Day)
actions.description: A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends from the darkmantle, moves with it, and spreads around corners. Lasts up to 10 minutes with concentration. Darkvision can't penetrate, and no natural light illuminates it. Dispels light spells of 2nd level or lower.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The death knight has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Marshal Undead
traits.description: Unless incapacitated, the death knight and chosen undead within 60 feet have advantage on saving throws against features that turn undead.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.description: 19th-level spellcaster, Charisma (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit). Paladin spells: 1st (4 slots): command, compelled duel, searing smite; 2nd (3 slots): hold person, magic weapon; 3rd (3 slots): dispel magic, elemental weapon; 4th (3 slots): banishment, staggering smite; 5th (2 slots): destructive wave (necrotic).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The death knight makes three longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) if two-handed, plus 18 (4d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Hellfire Orb (1/Day)
actions.description: Hurls a magical fireball that explodes within 120 ft. in a 20-ft. radius. Each creature must make a DC 18 Dexterity save, taking 35 (10d6) fire + 35 (10d6) necrotic damage on failure, or half on success.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The death knight adds 6 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. Must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Demilich
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from magic weapons
monsters.damage_immunities: necrotic, poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned

traits.name: Avoidance
traits.description: If subjected to an effect allowing a saving throw for half damage, takes no damage on success, half on failure.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.description: The demilich is immune to effects that turn undead.

traits.name: Lair Actions
traits.description: In its lair (CR 20, 24500 XP), on initiative count 20, rolls d20; on 11+, causes one: tomb trembles (DC 19 Dex save or prone); antimagic field on one creature within 60 ft. until next count 20; no healing for creatures within 30 ft. until next count 20.

actions.name: Howl (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Each creature within 30 ft. that can hear must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution save or drop to 0 hit points. On success, frightened until end of next turn.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.description: Up to three creatures within 10 ft. must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution save or take 21 (6d6) necrotic damage; demilich regains HP equal to total damage dealt.

actions.name: Trap Soul (Acererak Variant, CR 21 or 23 in lair)
actions.description: One creature within 30 ft. must make a DC 19 Charisma save. On failure, soul trapped in gem, body/equipment vanishes. On success, 24 (7d6) necrotic damage; if reduced to 0 HP, soul trapped. Soul devoured after 24 hours.

options: Flight: Flies up to half its flying speed.
Cloud of Dust: Creatures within 10 ft. must succeed on DC 15 Con save or be blinded until end of demilich's next turn.
Energy Drain (Costs 2 Actions): Creatures within 30 ft. make DC 15 Con save; hit point maximum reduced by 10 (3d6) on failure, death if reduced to 0.
Vile Curse (Costs 3 Actions): One creature within 30 ft. makes DC 15 Wis save or has disadvantage on attacks/saves until curse ends (repeat save each turn).

monsters.name: Balor
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.description: On death, explodes; creatures within 30 ft. make DC 20 Dex save, taking 70 (20d6) fire damage on failure, half on success. Ignites flammable objects.

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: At start of turn, creatures within 5 ft. take 10 (3d6) fire damage; flammable objects ignite. Melee attackers within 5 ft. take 10 (3d6) fire damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The balor's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
traits.description: 50% chance to summon 1d8 vrocks, 1d6 hezrous, 1d4 glabrezus, 1d3 nalfeshnees, 1d2 mariliths, or one goristro.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes two attacks: one with longsword, one with whip.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) lightning damage. Critical hit rolls damage dice three times.

actions.name: Whip
actions.hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage, and DC 20 Str save or pulled up to 25 ft. toward balor.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: Teleports with equipment up to 120 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see.

monsters.name: Barlgura
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 15

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Wisdom (spell save DC 13). 1/day each: entangle, phantasmal force. 2/day each: disguise self, invisibility (self only).

traits.name: Reckless
traits.description: At start of turn, can gain advantage on melee weapon attack rolls that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until next turn.

traits.name: Running Leap
traits.description: Long jump up to 40 ft., high jump up to 20 ft. with a running start.

traits.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
traits.description: 30% chance to summon one barlgura.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes three attacks: one with bite, two with fists.

monsters.name: Chasme
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 15

traits.name: Drone
traits.description: Non-demons within 30 ft. at start of turn must succeed on DC 12 Con save or fall unconscious for 10 min. Immune if can't hear or on success for 24 hours. Ends with damage or holy water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: Can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down, without ability check.

traits.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
traits.description: 30% chance to summon one chasme.

actions.name: Proboscis
actions.hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 24 (7d6) necrotic damage, and hit point maximum reduced by necrotic damage until long rest or greater restoration. Dies if maximum reduced to 0.

monsters.name: Dretch
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning
monsters.languages: Abyssal, telepathy 60 ft. (works only with creatures that understand Abyssal)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes two attacks: one with bite, one with claws.

actions.name: Fetid Cloud (1/Day)
actions.description: 10-ft. radius gas, lightly obscured, lasts 1 min or until dispersed by wind. Creatures starting turn in area make DC 11 Con save or are poisoned until next turn, limited to action or bonus action, no reactions.

monsters.name: Glabrezu
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Intelligence (spell save DC 16). At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic. 1/day each: confusion, fly, power word stun.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
traits.description: 30% chance to summon 1d3 vrocks, 1d2 hezrous, or one glabrezu.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes four attacks: two with pincers, two with fists. Alternatively, two pincer attacks and one spell.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If Medium or smaller, grappled (escape DC 15). Can grapple two targets.

monsters.name: Goristro
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Charge
traits.description: If moves at least 15 ft. straight and hits with gore, target takes extra 38 (7d10) piercing damage; if creature, DC 21 Str save or pushed 20 ft. and prone.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.description: Perfectly recalls any path it has traveled.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: Deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes three attacks: two with fists, one with hoof.

actions.name: Hoof
actions.hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If creature, DC 21 Str save or knocked prone.

monsters.name: Hezrou
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Stench
traits.description: Creatures starting turn within 10 ft. make DC 14 Con save or poisoned until next turn. Success grants immunity for 24 hours.

traits.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
traits.description: 30% chance to summon 2d6 dretches or one hezrou.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes three attacks: one with bite, two with claws.

monsters.name: Manes
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

monsters.name: Marilith
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The marilith's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Reactive
traits.description: Can take one reaction on every turn in combat.

traits.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
traits.description: 50% chance to summon 1d6 vrocks, 1d4 hezrous, 1d3 glabrezus, 1d2 nalfeshnees, or one marilith.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes seven attacks: six with longswords, one with tail.

actions.name: Tail
actions.hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If Medium or smaller, grappled (escape DC 19). Auto-hits grappled target, can't target others.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: Teleports with equipment up to 120 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: Adds 5 to AC against one melee attack that would hit. Must see attacker and wield melee weapon.

monsters.name: Nalfeshnee
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
traits.description: 50% chance to summon 1d4 vrocks, 1d3 hezrous, 1d2 glabrezus, or one nalfeshnee.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Uses Horror Nimbus if available, then makes three attacks: one with bite, two with claws.

actions.name: Horror Nimbus (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Emits light; creatures within 15 ft. that can see make DC 15 Wis save or frightened for 1 min. Repeat save each turn, immune for 24 hours on success.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: Teleports with equipment up to 120 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see.

monsters.name: Quasit
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: Polymorph into bat (10 ft., fly 40 ft.), centipede (40 ft., climb 40 ft.), or toad (40 ft., swim 40 ft.), or back to true form. Stats same except speed. Equipment not transformed.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Familiar (Variant)
traits.description: Can serve as familiar, forming telepathic bond with master within 1 mile. Master shares senses and Magic Resistance within 10 ft. Can end service at will.

actions.name: Claws (Bite in Beast Form)
actions.hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and DC 10 Con save or take 5 (2d4) poison damage and poisoned for 1 min. Repeat save each turn.

actions.name: Scare (1/Day)
actions.description: One creature within 20 ft. makes DC 10 Wis save or frightened for 1 min. Repeat save each turn, with disadvantage if quasit in sight. Success ends effect.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: Turns invisible with equipment until attacks, uses Scare, or concentration ends.

monsters.name: Shadow Demon
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, necrotic, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: Can move through creatures/objects as difficult terrain, taking 5 (1d10) force damage if ending turn inside object.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.description: In bright light, disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks relying on sight.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.description: In dim light or darkness, can take Hide action as a bonus action.

monsters.name: Vrock
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
traits.description: 30% chance to summon 2d4 dretches or one vrock.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes two attacks: one with beak, one with talons.

actions.name: Spores (Recharge 6)
actions.description: 15-ft. radius cloud of toxic spores. Creatures make DC 14 Con save or poisoned, taking 5 (1d10) poison damage each turn start. Repeat save or holy water ends effect.

actions.name: Stunning Screech (1/Day)
actions.description: Non-demons within 20 ft. that hear make DC 14 Con save or stunned until end of vrock's next turn.

monsters.name: Yochlol
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: Polymorph into female drow, giant spider, or true form. Stats same, equipment not transformed, reverts on death.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: Can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down, without ability check.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Charisma (spell save DC 14). At will: detect thoughts, web. 1/day: dominate person.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: Ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

traits.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
traits.description: 50% chance to summon one yochlol.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam (Bite in Spider Form)
actions.hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning (piercing in spider form) damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Mist Form
actions.description: Transforms into toxic mist or reverts. Incapacitated, can't speak, flies 30 ft., passes through non-airtight spaces, advantage on Str/Dex/Con saves, immune to nonmagical damage. Poison creatures in space (DC 14 Con save or incapacitated).

monsters.name: Barbed Devil
monsters.damage_resistances: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Barbed Hide
traits.description: At start of turn, deals 5 (1d10) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Summon Devil (1/Day)
traits.description: 30% chance to summon one barbed devil.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes three melee attacks: one with tail, two with claws. Alternatively, uses Hurl Flame twice.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage. Flammable objects catch fire.

monsters.name: Bearded Devil
monsters.damage_resistances: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Steadfast
traits.description: The devil can't be frightened while it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes two attacks: one with its beard and one with its glaive.

actions.name: Beard
actions.hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or lose 5 (1d10) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 (1d10). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

monsters.name: Bone Devil
monsters.damage_resistances: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

actions.name: Sting
actions.hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Chain Devil
monsters.damage_resistances: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Chain
actions.hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 14) if the devil isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Animate Chains (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: Up to four chains the devil can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razor-edged barbs and animate under the devil's control, provided that the chains aren't being worn or carried. Each animated chain is an object with AC 20, 20 hit points, resistance to piercing damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage. When the devil uses Multiattack on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple one creature of its own but can't make attacks while grappling. An animated chain reverts to its inanimate state if reduced to 0 hit points or if the devil is incapacitated or dies.

reactions.name: Unnerving Mask
reactions.description: When a creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil, the devil can create the illusion that it looks like one of the creature's departed loved ones or bitter enemies. If the creature can see the devil, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its turn.

monsters.name: Erinyes
monsters.damage_resistances: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Hellish Weapons
traits.description: The erinyes's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 (3d8) poison damage on a hit (included in the attacks).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The erinyes makes three attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. The poison lasts until it is removed by the lesser restoration spell or similar magic.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Horned Devil
monsters.damage_resistances: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes three melee attacks: two with its fork and one with its tail. It can use Hurl Flame in place of any melee attack.

actions.name: Tail
actions.hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or lose 10 (3d6) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 10 (3d6). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.hit: 14 (4d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

monsters.name: Ice Devil
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 12

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

monsters.name: Imp
monsters.damage_resistances: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The imp can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a rat (speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., climb 20 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Sting (Bite in Beast Form)
actions.hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: The imp magically turns invisible until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the imp wears or carries is invisible with it.

monsters.name: Lemure
monsters.damage_resistances: cold

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the lemure's darkvision.

traits.name: Hellish Rejuvenation
traits.description: A lemure that dies in the Nine Hells comes back to life with all its hit points in 1d10 days unless it is killed by a good-aligned creature with a bless spell cast on that creature or its remains are sprinkled with holy water.

monsters.name: Pit Fiend
monsters.damage_resistances: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Fear Aura
traits.description: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw, unless the pit fiend is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The pit fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The pit fiend's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: The pit fiend's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 21). The pit fiend can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: detect magic, fireball. 3/day each: hold monster, wall of fire.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The pit fiend makes four attacks: one with its bite, one with its claw, one with its mace, and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.hit: 22 (4d6 + 8) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 21 (6d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Spined Devil
monsters.damage_resistances: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Limited Spines
traits.description: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.description: If the allosaurus moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the allosaurus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Tail
actions.hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The pteranodon doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Trampling Charge
traits.description: If the triceratops moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the triceratops can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.hit: 33 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

traits.name: Avoidance
traits.description: If the displacer beast is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Displacement
traits.description: The displacer beast projects a magical illusion that makes it appear to be standing near its actual location, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn. This trait is also disrupted while the displacer beast is incapacitated or has a speed of 0.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The displacer beast makes two attacks with its tentacles.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.description: The doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.description: If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The doppelganger makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Read Thoughts
actions.description: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the doppelganger's concentration isn't broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, the doppelganger has advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Deception, Intimidation, and Persuasion) checks against the target.

monsters.name: Adult Blue Dracolich
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 22

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The dracolich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dracolich can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.description: Each creature of the dracolich's choice that is within 120 feet of the dracolich and aware of it must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dracolich's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The dracolich exhales lightning in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

options: Detect: The dracolich makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
Tail Attack: The dracolich makes a tail attack.

Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions): The dracolich beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dracolich must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. After beating its wings this way, the dracolich can fly up to half its flying speed.

monsters.name: Young Red Shadow Dragon
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

traits.name: Living Shadow
traits.description: While in dim light or darkness, the dragon has resistance to damage that isn't force, psychic, or radiant.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.description: While in dim light or darkness, the dragon can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the dragon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Shadow Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The dragon exhales shadowy fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies, and an undead shadow rises from its corpse and acts immediately after the dragon in the initiative count. The shadow is under the dragon's control.

actions.description: The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. actions.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons. Fire Breath: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Weakening Breath: The dragon exhales gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, Strength checks, and Strength saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Ancient Silver Dragon
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 26

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.description: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons. Cold Breath: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Paralyzing Breath: The dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.description: The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice). In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

monsters.name: Dragon Turtle
monsters.damage_resistances: fire

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon turtle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can make one tail attack in place of its two claw attacks.

actions.name: Tail
actions.hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the dragon turtle and knocked prone.

actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The dragon turtle exhales scalding steam in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 52 (15d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: The drider has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Wisdom (spell save DC 13). At will: dancing lights. 1/day each: darkness, faerie fire.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The drider makes three attacks, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Charisma (spell save DC 14). At will: druidcraft. 3/day each: entangle, goodberry. 1/day each: barkskin, pass without trace, shillelagh.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
traits.description: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

traits.name: Tree Stride
traits.description: Once on her turn, the dryad can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

actions.name: Club
actions.hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

actions.name: Fey Charm
actions.description: The dryad targets one humanoid or beast that she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the dryad, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed. The charmed creature regards the dryad as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the dryad's control, it takes the dryad's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can. Each time the dryad or its allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the dryad dies, is on a different plane of existence from the target, or ends the effect as a bonus action. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the dryad's Fey Charm for the next 24 hours. The dryad can have no more than one humanoid and up to three beasts charmed at a time.

monsters.name: Duergar
monsters.damage_resistances: poison

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
traits.description: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

actions.name: War Pick
actions.hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, or 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: The duergar magically turns invisible until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

monsters.name: Air Elemental
monsters.damage_resistances: lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Air Form
traits.description: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Whirlwind (Recharge 4-6)
actions.description: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage and is flung up 20 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone. If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't flung away or knocked prone.

monsters.name: Earth Elemental
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.description: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

monsters.name: Fire Elemental
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.description: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
traits.description: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two touch attacks.

actions.name: Touch
actions.hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

monsters.name: Water Elemental
monsters.damage_resistances: acid; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Water Form
traits.description: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Freeze
traits.description: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Whelm (Recharge 4-6)
actions.description: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space. The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a DC 14 Strength check and succeeding.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Charisma (spell save DC 11). At will: dancing lights. 1/day each: darkness, faerie fire.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Charisma (spell save DC 12). At will: dancing lights. 1/day each: darkness, faerie fire, levitate (self only).

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The drow makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The drow adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the drow must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: Charisma (spell save DC 12). At will: dancing lights. 1/day each: darkness, faerie fire, levitate (self only).
